scripts.build: npm run build:gen && npm run build:as && node tools/add_spac_in_wat.js build/ashello.wat
scripts.build:wat: wat2wasm build/ashello.wat -o build/ashello.wasm && cp build/ashello.wasm .dfx/local/canisters/ashello/ && dfx canister install --all --mode reinstall
scripts.build:as: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/ashello.wasm -t build/ashello.wat --sourceMap  --runtime none --target wasm32 --use abort=
scripts.rebuild: npm run build && npm run build:wat
scripts.dfx_run: npm run build && npm run build:wat && npm run dfx_test
